item.title: 12 Benefits of Sweet Potato: How To Cook, Recipes
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Sweet potatoes are delicious, nutritious, and healthy. They’re also one of the most versatile vegetables around. They are loaded with nutrients such as vitamins A, C, B6, iron, potassium, fiber, and antioxidants. They’re low in calories and fat, making them perfect for weight loss. And because they’re high in fiber, they help lower cholesterol levels.… Read More »12 Benefits of Sweet Potato: How To Cook, Recipes

item.title: 10 Surprising Benefits of Eggplant For Anemia
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Iron is an essential mineral that helps your body produce red blood cells. If you’re anemic, then you need to increase the amount of iron in your diet. One of the best ways to do this is by eating foods rich in iron. Eggplants are among those foods. They contain a lot of iron, as… Read More »10 Surprising Benefits of Eggplant For Anemia

item.title: 6 Amazing Health Benefits Of Blood Orange
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Blood oranges are recognized for their vivid color. Anthocyanin gives these oranges their bright orange flesh. Blood orange nutrition is getting more popular day by day. The low-calorie fruit is high in fiber, vitamin C, and potassium. Blood oranges may aid weight reduction, boost immunity, and reduce the risk of cancer and diabetes. item.title: Banana Milk Diet For Weight Gain
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Adding banana and milk to your diet might help you shed weight or increase lean muscle. There are several advantages to eating a banana with milk. The combination is high in potassium, fiber, calcium, and protein. Consuming banana milkshakes is an excellent strategy to stay full.
